title: Create tick-card component
acceptance_criteria: tick-card renders all tick fields, priority colors match Catppuccin palette, click emits tick-selected event
closed_reason: Created tick-card.ts component with: tick ID/title display, type badge (with colored variants for bug/feature/epic/task/chore), priority indicator (color-coded left border), status badge, blocked indicator, manual task indicator, awaiting state indicator, optional epic name, and click handler emitting tick-selected event. Uses Catppuccin colors and follows existing Lit patterns. Registered in main.ts.
